thread.title: Trolling Man Utd fan claims he forced Liverpool to change Twitter bio over trophy count
thread.title_full: Trolling Man Utd fan claims he forced Liverpool to change Twitter bio over trophy count

title: Trolling Man Utd fan claims he forced Liverpool to change Twitter bio over trophy count
text:
Trolling Man Utd fan claims he forced Liverpool to change Twitter bio over trophy count Getty 0 26-Feb-2017 03:49:25 The Red Devils supporter believes he forced the Merseyside club to adjust their Twitter bio with some expert trolling EXTRA TIME 
Mata to join Man Utd squad after funeral 
That's exactly what one supporter is saying after the Reds removed a line claiming supremacy as "England's most successful club with 41 major honours". 
As Red Devils fans have been quick to point out, victory for United over Southampton in the EFL Cup final Sunday will bring the club to 42 major trophies — trumping Liverpool's total. Liverpool will have to change this Twitter Bio if Manchester United win the EFL Cup on Sunday pic.twitter.com/0BfHPvj9VN — José (@MourinhoMindset) February 24, 2017 
One fan, with the Twitter handle @MourinhoMindset, posted Friday morning that "Liverpool will have to change this Twitter Bio if Manchester United win the EFL Cup on Sunday". The tweet has since gone viral, garnering more than 2,000 retweets. 
A few hours later, the line referencing Liverpool's trophy haul was removed from the bio — prompting the United fan to ever-so-humbly tweet: "I HAVE MADE LIVERPOOL FOOTBALL CLUB CHANGE THEIR BIO I CAN'T STOP LAUGHING". I HAVE MADE LIVERPOOL FOOTBALL CLUB CHANGE THEIR BIO I CAN'T STOP LAUGHING pic.twitter.com/TFioXo65Jl 
Should Southampton emerge victorious Sunday, all eyes surely will be on Liverpool's social media team to see if they promptly restore the trophy reference... Related
